summary: On a transatlantic crossing, The Marx Brothers get up to their usual antics and manage to annoy just about everyone on board the ship.
cast: The Marx Brothers|Groucho Marx|Harpo Marx|Chico Marx|Zeppo Marx|Rockliffe Fellowes|Harry Woods|Thelma Todd|Ruth Hall|Tom Kennedy|Eddie Baker|Bobby Barber|Billy Barty|Billy Bletcher|Eddie Borden|James Bradbury Jr.|Maxine Castle|Maurice Chevalier|Davison Clark|Cecil Cunningham|Bobby Dunn|Al Flosso|Bess Flowers|Otto Fries|Sherry Hall|Pat Harmon|Ethan Laidlaw|Sam Marx|Charlotte Mineau|Harold Minjir|William H. O'Brien|Evelyn Pierce|Cyril Ring|Constantine Romanoff|Rolfe Sedan|Frederick Sullivan|Ben Taggart|Leo White|Leo Willis
director: Director: Norman Z. McLeod (as Norman McLeod)
title: Pistoleros de agua dulce
